issue.title: management of attached file in an order
issue.body:
**Original author :** Mérour Xavier

This is a small GUI enhancement.

The file attached to an order (one responded) should be deleted after xx days (config in backend) and the icon will remain with a red cross (need a flag in the database)

comments.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

Has been implemented the differently in V4:
- in orders list, a paper clip icon is show if the order has at least one file downloadable
- In the order details, download button has a text showing how many days left the file is available, and a message when it's not anymore.
